Summary: flashing blinking light moving radomly changing directions then stopping then moving again
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in the front yard smoking a cigarette and looking at the stars my sister in law came out and noticed something blinking and moving she pointed it out and i clwarly saw starlike but larger object moving randomly and changing direction then stopping and moving again blinking red white blue green. It would get brighter as it moved and faded when it stopped. We watched it for 30 minutes before going inside. I saw this object before exactly in albuquerque new mexico and i had a witness with me then also in fact i called that witness as i watched this recent one and told her she was amazed. I also reported that previous sigjting to mufon.
